name: and-todays-free-dairy-dose-is
title: And Today’s Free Dairy Dose Is…
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Purity Dairies! In the past few weeks, we’ve had free Ben & Jerry’s, Baskin Robbins (twice if you’re an expectant mother), Dippin Dots and Haagen-Dazs. Not about to be left out on the action, Purity Dairies is handing out samples of their four new frozen yogurt smoothies downtown today. Stop by the Nashville City Center Plaza at 511 Union Street if you want in on yet another free ice cream deal. Our Nashvillest jeans are getting tighter, but at least our wallets aren’t getting any lighter.

Photo by Brent and MariLynn.
